text: vahee hai jisane soory ko sarvatha deepti aur chandrama ka prakaash banaaya aur unake lie manzilen nishchit kee, taaki tum varshon kee ginatee aur hisaab maaloom kar liya karo. allaah ne yah sab kuchh soddeshy hee paida kiya hai. vah apanee nishaaniyon ko un logon ke lie khol-kholakar bayaan karata hai, jo jaanana chaahen
